description.value: The forms you take on defy belief-chimerical sights of twisted antlers or acidic drool. If your next action is to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Wild Shape]{Wild Shape}, you can change the damage type of a single unarmed attack granted by the wild shape form to one of the following: acid, bludgeoning, cold, electricity, fire, poison, piercing, or slashing. The chosen attack gains the appropriate trait.
